reviewText: I had to send it back because there were no English language options or at least subtitles in English. I was disappointed I could not see and enjoy the film.

Too bad the CC  is only in German, kind of limit the market to Spanish-German only. I was glad I know spanish.
I am sure will be a lot of people disappointed to open the movie to see that they can't understand, and there is no option for another idiom.
Messi is the best soccer player of the world, and many people were expecting to see the movie.
May be you can talk to the producers about this.
